overview: Hoda loves Waheed, the student, who lives in one of the apartments in the building owned by her mother. Waheed gets to know Hassouna and Salama, who live in the same house. As for their colleague Shawqi, he gets to know the dancer Ashjan, who takes advantage of his naivety and uses him in drug smuggling operations with her lover Hamza. Waheed, Hassouna and Salama go to the club with Shawky, so Ashjan admires Waheed, and they meet again. The police chase Hamza, who arrives at Ashjan's house and is surprised by the presence of Waheed. Ashjan refuses to run away with Hamza.
title: احترس!!! نحن المجانين
